original_title: Vanessa Mae: The Red Hot Tour - Live at the Royal Albert Hall
overview: FILMED ON JUNE 30th 195 AT LONDON'S ROYAL ALBERT HALL, as part of a mammoth 34-date UK Red Hot Tour. Vanessa-Mae introduces both her acoustic & her electric violin in a unique combination of pop, classical & techno-acoustic fusion, including tracks from her world-wide multiple hit album " The Violin Player ".
title: Vanessa Mae: The Red Hot Tour - Live at the Royal Albert Hall
